1.name: Spider-Man: Homecoming
1.description: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.

2.name: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
2.description: Four teenagers are sucked into a magical video game, and the only way they can escape is to work together to finish the game.

3.name: The Current War
3.description: The dramatic story of the cutthroat race between electricity titans Thomas Edison and George Westinghouse to determine whose electrical system would power the modern world.

4.name: It
4.description: In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shape-shifting monster, which disguises itself as a clown and preys on the children of Derry, their small Maine town.

5.name: Baby Driver
5.description: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, a young getaway driver finds himself taking part in a heist doomed to fail.

6.name: Thor: Ragnarok
6.description: Thor (Chris Hemsworth) is imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, and must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnarök, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela (Cate Blanchett).

7.name: John Wick: Chapter 2
7.description: After returning to the criminal underworld to repay a debt, John Wick discovers that a large bounty has been put on his life.

8.name: The Greatest Showman
8.description: Celebrates the birth of show business and tells of a visionary who rose from nothing to create a spectacle that became a worldwide sensation.

9.name: Get Out
9.description: A young African-American visits his white girlfriend's parents for the weekend, where his simmering uneasiness about their reception of him eventually reaches a boiling point.

10.name: Annabelle: Creation
10.description: Twelve years after the tragic death of their little girl, a doll-maker and his wife welcome a nun and several girls from a shuttered orphanage into their home, where they become the target of the doll-maker's possessed creation, Annabelle.

11.name: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
11.description: The Guardians struggle to keep together as a team while dealing with their personal family issues, notably Star-Lord's encounter with his father the ambitious celestial being Ego.

12.name: Baywatch
12.description: Devoted lifeguard Mitch Buchannon butts heads with a brash new recruit, as they uncover a criminal plot that threatens the future of the bay.

13.name: The Dark Tower
13.description: The last Gunslinger: Roland Deschain, has been locked in an eternal battle with Walter O'Dim, also known as the Man in Black, and determined to prevent him from toppling the Dark Tower that holds the universe together. With the fate of the world at stake, good and evil will collide in the ultimate battle, as only Roland can defend the Tower from the Man in Black.

14.name: Power Rangers
14.description: A group of high-school students, who are infused with unique superpowers, harness their abilities in order to save the world.

15.name: Justice League
15.description: Fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of his new-found ally, Diana Prince, to face an even greater enemy.

16.name: The Upside
16.description: A comedic look at the relationship between a wealthy man with quadriplegia and an unemployed man with a criminal record who's hired to help him.

17.name: Blade Runner 2049
17.description: A young blade runner's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former blade runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.

18.name: Logan
18.description: In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an elderly and weary Logan leads a quiet life. But when Laura, a mutant child pursued by scientists, comes to him for help, he must get her to safety.

19.name: Star Wars: Episode VIII - The Last Jedi
19.description: Rey develops her newly discovered abilities with the guidance of Luke Skywalker, who is unsettled by the strength of her powers. Meanwhile, the Resistance prepares for battle with the First Order.

20.name: Dunkirk
20.description: Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Empire, and France are surrounded by the German Army, and evacuated during a fierce battle in World War II.

21.name: Call Me by Your Name
21.description: In 1980s Italy, a romance blossoms between a seventeen-year-old student and the older man hired as his father's research assistant.

22.name: Coco
22.description: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

23.name: Wonder Woman
23.description: When a pilot crashes and tells of conflict in the outside world, Diana, an Amazonian warrior in training, leaves home to fight a war, discovering her full powers and true destiny.

24.name: Unlocked
24.description: A CIA interrogator is lured into a ruse that puts London at risk of a biological attack.

25.name: The Fate of the Furious
25.description: When a mysterious woman seduces Dom into the world of terrorism and a betrayal of those closest to him, the crew face trials that will test them as never before.

26.name: Beauty and the Beast
26.description: A selfish prince is cursed to become a monster for the rest of his life, unless he learns to fall in love with a beautiful young woman he keeps prisoner.

27.name: The Shape of Water
27.description: At a top secret research facility in the 1960s, a lonely janitor forms a unique relationship with an amphibious creature that is being held in captivity.

28.name: Valerian and the City of a Thousand Planets
28.description: A dark force threatens Alpha, a vast metropolis and home to species from a thousand planets. Special operatives Valerian and Laureline must race to identify the marauding menace and safeguard not just Alpha, but the future of the universe.

29.name: Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri
29.description: A mother personally challenges the local authorities to solve her daughter's murder when they fail to catch the culprit.

30.name: Mother!
30.description: A couple's relationship is tested when uninvited guests arrive at their home, disrupting their tranquil existence.

31.name: Transformers: The Last Knight
31.description: A deadly threat from Earth's history reappears, and a hunt for a lost artifact takes place between Autobots and Decepticons, while Optimus Prime encounters his creator in space.

32.name: Kong: Skull Island
32.description: After the Vietnam war, a team of scientists explores an uncharted island in the Pacific, venturing into the domain of the mighty Kong, and must fight to escape a primal Eden.

33.name: Alien: Covenant
33.description: The crew of a colony ship, bound for a remote planet, discover an uncharted paradise with a threat beyond their imagination, and must attempt a harrowing escape.

34.name: Wonder
34.description: Based on the New York Times bestseller, this movie tells the incredibly inspiring and heartwarming story of August Pullman, a boy with facial differences who enters the fifth grade, attending a mainstream elementary school for the first time.

35.name: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales
35.description: Captain Jack Sparrow searches for the trident of Poseidon while being pursued by an undead sea captain and his crew.

36.name: Gifted
36.description: Frank, a single man raising his child prodigy niece Mary, is drawn into a custody battle with his mother.

37.name: The Mummy
37.description: An ancient Egyptian princess is awakened from her crypt beneath the desert, bringing with her malevolence grown over millennia, and terrors that defy human comprehension.

38.name: Murder on the Orient Express
38.description: When a murder occurs on the train on which he's travelling, celebrated detective Hercule Poirot is recruited to solve the case.

39.name: Ghost in the Shell
39.description: In the near future, Major Mira Killian is the first of her kind: A human saved from a terrible crash, who is cyber-enhanced to be a perfect soldier devoted to stopping the world's most dangerous criminals.

40.name: The Emoji Movie
40.description: Gene, a multi-expressional emoji, sets out on a journey to become a normal emoji.

41.name: Kingsman: The Golden Circle
41.description: When their headquarters are destroyed and the world is held hostage, the Kingsman's journey leads them to the discovery of an allied spy organization in the United States. These two elite secret organizations must band together to defeat a common enemy.

42.name: Wind River
42.description: A veteran hunter helps an FBI agent investigate the murder of a young woman on a Wyoming Native American reservation.

43.name: King Arthur: Legend of the Sword
43.description: Robbed of his birthright, Arthur comes up the hard way in the back alleys of the city. But once he pulls the sword from the stone, he is forced to acknowledge his true legacy - whether he likes it or not.

44.name: Life
44.description: A team of scientists aboard the International Space Station discover a rapidly evolving life form that caused extinction on Mars and now threatens all life on Earth.

45.name: Downsizing
45.description: A social satire in which a man realizes he would have a better life if he were to shrink himself to five inches tall, allowing him to live in wealth and splendor.

46.name: Gerald's Game
46.description: While trying to spice up their marriage in their remote lake house, Jessie must fight to survive when her husband dies unexpectedly, leaving her handcuffed to their bed frame.

47.name: I, Tonya
47.description: Competitive ice skater Tonya Harding rises amongst the ranks at the U.S. Figure Skating Championships, but her future in the activity is thrown into doubt when her ex-husband intervenes.

48.name: Home Again
48.description: Life for a single mom in Los Angeles takes an unexpected turn when she allows three young guys to move in with her.

49.name: Molly's Game
49.description: The true story of Molly Bloom, an Olympic-class skier who ran the world's most exclusive high-stakes poker game and became an FBI target.

50.name: Bright
50.description: A detective must work with an Orc to find a powerful wand before evil creatures do.
